title: Watch: Gujarat Titans, IPL 2022 champions – the winning moments
content:
.@gujarat_titans - The #TATAIPL 2022 Champions! 👏 👏 🏆 👍The @hardikpandya7-led unit, in their maiden IPL season, clinch the title on their home ground - the Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad. 🙌🙌 @GCAMoteraA round of applause for the spirited @rajasthanroyals! 👏 👏 #GTvRR pic.twitter.com/LfIpmP4m2f— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 29, 2022

IPL 2022 Final Live Blog: Scores, reactions, stats and more
author: Scroll Staff
